title: Calendar Calculation Function Block
description: This function block is designed to calculate local time and calendar-related data based on UTC input. It updates the local date, time of day, sunset, sunrise, and other related events depending on the provided holiday data and location information.
name: CALENDAR_CALC

input.name: SPE
input.description: A boolean flag that enables the calculation of the sun's position every 25 seconds if set to TRUE.

input.name: H
input.description: Twilight offset parameter for sunrise/sunset calculations, defaults to -0.8333.

output.name: XCAL
output.description: The calendar data structure that contains local date, time, holidays, and sun information.

output.name: HOLIDAYS
output.description: An array of holiday data to be used for local holiday calculations.
